bug.author: kparichay
bug.description:
Custom and Custom-easy filters are being registered twice by calling register_subplugin. This can be checked by running build/tests/unittest_src_iio or build/tests/unittest_sink <denchmark-code>[==========] Running 70 tests from 3 test cases. [----------] Global test environment set-up. [----------] 6 tests from tensor_sink_test [ RUN ] tensor_sink_test.properties
** (unittest_sink:18584): CRITICAL **: Subplugin custom is already registered.
** (unittest_sink:18584): CRITICAL **: Subplugin custom-easy is already registered.
</denchmark-code>

comments.comment: : Thank you for posting issue <denchmark-link:https://github.com/nnstreamer/nnstreamer/issues/1874>#1874</denchmark-link> . The person in charge will reply soon.
